our_goal: We develop original game ideas with care, focusing on creating experiences that are engaging, functional, and enjoyable to play.
company_desc: TryVox Studio is an independent game development team based on Tashkent, Uzbekistan, established on 2025, focuses on gameplay and the fun the player having.
company_spec: We specialize in a variety of game genres â€” from 2D puzzles to 3D first-person simulators. Our goal is to build the kinds of experiences players actually want to play, not just what the industry expects us to produce.

ded_game_description: Survive the chaos of retirement life in this hilarious dacha simulator
ded_game_intro: Take on the role of a classic grandpa who must survive the daily challenges of dacha life, from endless repairs to epic battles with neighbors over crops.
ded_game_feature_1_desc: Fix everything with your own hands (poorly) and witness hilarious consequences
ded_game_feature_2_desc: Defend your tomatoes from neighbor Stanislav Petrovich in epic cane vs mop battles
ded_game_feature_3_desc: Fight mysterious creatures in tracksuits using your trusty slingshot and egg-shooting chickens
team_aziz_message: Managing projects and ensuring effective communication between all team members
team_umid_message: Creating engaging game design and mechanics that make games exciting
team_abbos_message: Developing game systems and functionality in Unity to create quality projects
team_dron_message: Programming game logic and optimizing performance in Unity
team_arika_message: Creating visual elements and animations that bring game worlds to life
